Title: If You Work for a Living, Then Why Do You Kill Yourself Working?
Plot: The DEA brings Nancy in for questioning and then she must explain things to Esteban. Celia travels deep into Mexico to make amends with estranged daughter Quinn. Meanwhile, Silas meets Lisa's ex-husband and Doug finds a reason to live. Nancy makes a shocking revelation to Esteban.
GuestStars: Jillian Rose Reed, Joey Wagner Luthman, John Mese
